text: Hagi anante amanage hu'na zamasami'noe, Ko'ma megi'a vahe'mo'zama mago'a nagatima zagoreti'ma mizase'za ome kinama huzmante'nazana maka ete mizama huta zamavare megi atreku maraguzana netune. Hianagi zamagra zamafuhe'ina megi'a vahete zagorera netrazanki'za ete ana vahera tagrite zagore atregahaze. Anankema huge'za kva nagara ke'zamia omanege'za akohe'za mani'naze.
